short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current viewport size in the bottom right corner of the window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Please make sure to restart Chrome entirely so the code can load correctly**

This extension displays Chrome’s viewport dimensions when resizing the browser window in pixels.

This extension displays Chrome’s viewport dimensions in the lower right corner of the browser when dragging your window / Chrome browser.  It will show in Pixels and disappear completely after 1.8 seconds. 

Mainly for developers or creators when you want to make the browser window a specific size for testing websites or apps or if like me you want to make the viewport precisely 1920x1080 when recording screencasts at 1080p.
